title: How much longer will a 5000mAh battery in a flagship 5G phone last compared to the 3969mAh iPhone 11 Max Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nowhere near as long that's for sure! The iPhone 11 or Max is getting 11–13 hours of screen on time. My Galaxy s105g only got 7 hours of screen on time best case scenario so an extra 500 mAh will boost tht to around 9 hours at most and that won't be consistent.
